long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This software implements a single Time-Based One-Time Password (OTP) algorithm.  Secrets must be entered using the hexadecimal or base32 secret encoding formats.

Features:
1.6
  * Added additional border space in popup
  * fixed internal javascript error
  * 1.6.2 fixes packaging issue from 1.6
  * 1.6.3 updates javascript for best practices
1.5
  * Added support for up to 5 OTP tokens
1.4
  * Very small and simple
  * Can copy the 6 digit code to your clipboard
  * AES encrypts your secret for added protection
  * Runs as a popup from the Chrome menu
